website_summaries.verdict: If you need a quality running shoe, this model has the best of Nike's innovative features to absorb shock.
pros: Stands out for sporting Nike's Shox 4-column heel support
Also combines stable leather and synthetic materials and thick foot bed padding for optimal running support
cons: Our testers found these shoes to be somewhat stiff until you break them in, and they run narrow in size

customer_reviews.title: Not happy, bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Not satisfied: 1) the shoes fit tighter than all the other shox I had before (5 pairs); 2) lesser overall quality in the seams and leather; 3) not well put togeter, with the leather having wrinkles near the heel. Unfortunatelly I cannot return them, but those shoes either are 2nd choice or foulty (I'm even thinking fake ones... but hope not for the seller). The low price doesn't justify this low quality. Avoid buyng this shoes from SHOEZOO.
customer_reviews.author: claudio

customer_reviews.title: Love Shox and already have
customer_reviews.text: I love my Shox that I got last year and wanted another pair. I bought these thinking they were new but the ones I received looked like a warn pair. What I recived was a pair of factory reject shoes that wouldn't even be sold at a outlet store. Nike symbol was very frayed and glue was all over the shoe. The soles and springs covering were covered in glue that would not come off. Still had the numbers written in grease pencil where it was rejected.
customer_reviews.author: James Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love them just order a size larger than you usually wear.
customer_reviews.text: I have loved these shoes for years. They are the only ones that keep my back injury from hurting me. I love to exercise . I Ordered my husband a pair to help his horrible posture. They have helped him & he loves them too. I ordered mine in the men’s size hoping they would be a little wider but they are a little narrow and I’m having to stretch them. Needless to say I’m not returning them I’m loving them. I also ordered a size larger than I normally wear thx to the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: The only shoes my husband will wear
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wearing Nike Shox since they were available in this deep nubuck brown color. They've since stopped making that color, and were pleased with these dark grey ones. Well they've stopped making these now and are incredibly hard to find. He's gone through about 4 pairs now over the past 6 or so years (works as a mechanic, and is always on his feet). He won't wear anything else. If I could have a lifetime supply of these he would be so happy.
customer_reviews.author: S J J

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes still after 15 years would but again & again!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for husband bc he needed something to help his back pain. He is in love with these shoes. Now he is a true believer of the shox just like me. I’ve been rocking these out for 15 years!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Bad seems
customer_reviews.text: The heel was a little wider than the shox I've bought before. They only lasted 4 months before the seems started coming apart. There wasn't any extreme use. No exercising, jogging, mountain climbing, hiking. .. they were just to wear around the house. I bent down to pick something up and .. poooft... there went the side. I am not overly large. 5'6" 168LBS. I get the shox to help alleviate soreness because i have flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY ALBERT

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are mostly as expected.
customer_reviews.text: My husbands feet aren’t quite wide enough to warrant purchasing a wide, but enough so that normal width starts out snug. These shoes fit as expected, the insoles aren’t as cushioned as I figured they would be (rather hard actually) so he will probably get some inserts. But the overall quality is as expected and the shoes arrived on time and the correct color, etc. No complaints about the seller and would purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: RWarren

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: My wife thinks these shoes look stupid. I don't. It just goes to show how my superior fashion sense trumps hers. I like the support and fit. Very comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: T. Person

customer_reviews.title: This is a good shoe but it feels like it needs to be ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good shoe but it feels like it needs to be broken in.. The arch support is great but the shoe doesnt breathe very well and this will make your feet really hot. They arent the most comfortable shoe but if you are going to work out in them, or keep them on for only a few hours, its a great shoe..
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Worst shox I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Just above my right big toe they left a bigbstich. I have worn them for 2 hours and already have a blister. They are so uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: William Hieronymus

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I get so many compliments on them every time I go out in them. Leather is a bit snug at first. It took me a couple months to break in. Probably would have broke in quicker but they are too nice for me to wear all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Broome

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This shoe I love, except the seam around the toe box is VERY uncomfortable. It digs into my toe(right on the bone) only in that one spot on both feet. For $170 I'd like them to actually be comfortable. Other than that I like them a lot. Lots of compliments. Sadly I have to tell them how they fit.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Barry

customer_reviews.title: Imitation shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a pair of these shoes at the store before adn tehy fit just right and confortable, i bought a pair form this vendor and it is a good imitation from the outside look compared to an original, but the biggest difference is the way they feet and once you can compare them to the original ones, you can see the big differences. the only reason i bought them on line is casue i had a gift card but i WILL NEVER EVER again buy form this vendor!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio mezquita

customer_reviews.title: Not what i was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: They were not what I expected, very uncomfortable. I spent too much for them to be in that much pain all day and it just isn't for me. My inner ankle got cut and hurt everything I moved. It might be great for someone else so I might be different but I personally tried and couldn't get used to them.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: All in all nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: These were a little tight but not so much that I can’t wear them. They came in a little lighter than I expected from the picture. I was looking for black but these are more grey.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: My husband’s favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are my husband’s favorite shoes and have been for years - they’re comfortable, good looking & well made (just like him!)
customer_reviews.author: Susan C...ski

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes Nike ever made
customer_reviews.text: These are so awesome we have two pairs of the same exact shoe in the same exact color if that doesn’t say enough I don’t know what would!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Wellman-Ball

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved them. Size runs same as all Nike tennis shoes. Color as described
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: My expectation changed after these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I feel theses shoes are not original. They are very hard and they are not comfortable as I was imagining. They seem to be like a Rock in my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gatto

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is great for working on concrete for comfort, we'll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my Shox....
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a men's 7.5....i normally wear a women's 9. They are a little snug but will break in. I love the Nike Shox, just never can find them in a women's size! Wore them right out of the box, Nike never disappoints!
customer_reviews.author: CT. LOVER

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe for my husband, and the shoe runs small. The toe area is also narrow and smashes your toes together.
customer_reviews.author: Jenet

customer_reviews.title: Fit Great
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to order shoes online, but these fit great. They are more gray than my previous pair which I really liked.
customer_reviews.author: Klobie82

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Nike Shox from this reliable Seller!
customer_reviews.text: These are genuine Nike Shox that are difficult to source Arrived on time All leather!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Cummings

customer_reviews.title: I love this style of sneaker because it helps my feet ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this style of sneaker because it helps my feet and body due to two ruptured Achilles. I hope they bring these back many people want them always ask me where do they get some
customer_reviews.author: Walter L Jones

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Crappy shoe and was way too tight on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are hard to find. What I ordered is what I received. Fit was perfect! I’m very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Moree

customer_reviews.title: Neuropathy good friend here
customer_reviews.text: I think I should of ordered an size E, but I’ve needed these shoes to help me walk Diabetic Neuropathy is painful. These shoes help, plus bad knee. I will be ordering another pair just size E next time
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bonner

customer_reviews.title: Very rude gonna charge me half of price all money spend.
customer_reviews.text: U need to regions all the money back or going to different presses, your shoe was bothering my feet’s .your item is very bad . Your gonna get the action from my attorney
customer_reviews.author: King David

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Product fit was unlike previous Nike's that I have purchased. Then I was not refunded full amount. I would recommend NOT purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Caulder

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE SNEAKERS, JUST A BIT ON THE TIGHT SIDE, RECOMMEND ORDERING A 1/2 BIGGER THAN YOU NORMALLY WEAR
customer_reviews.author: kevin Hileman

customer_reviews.title: These are my husbands favorite shoes! We priced these out at a sporting ...
customer_reviews.text: These are my husbands favorite shoes! We priced these out at a sporting goods store and found them on Amazon for a considerably smaller amount. He is very satisfied with these shoes and loves how comfortable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a lower quality then what I am accustomed to from Nike.
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to be much stiffer than other Nike products I have purchased in the past. Maybe just a longer break in period is what I am experiencing.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D Hogoboom

customer_reviews.title: Look sleek!
customer_reviews.text: A little hard but I have other Shox. They break in after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Great heel and arch support
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes, mainly for the heel and arch support. Got him a half size bigger since they seem to run a little small. They fit and feel fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy C.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes came in with dirty finger print smudges and a damaged box
customer_reviews.text: Shoes came in with dirty finger print smudges and a damaged box. But over all the shores were in great condition luckily for to fact that the shores are leather type material, rather than canvas. However I wear a size twelve with all Nike running shoes previous. Which I Haber six pairs currently. The shox however, run veer tight. Length of shoe are correct. Width of shoe very slim. I can wear them for casual short walking but never could run out go for a long walk in these. However after washing of finger marks these shoes do look great lol.... If that's what you're going for ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I am going to buy a second pair, I love them !!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip S.

customer_reviews.title: Nikes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased shoes for my boyfriend, bought wrong size the 1st time, return process was simple and reordered the shoes. They came quickly and he really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe and feels well built
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe and feels well built. I guess I was used to other shoes they make now with the mesh on the sides. I would break through the sides with my little toes and wanted this shoe because of the way the sides are made
customer_reviews.author: Julie Perrien

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: Husband won’t wear anything else. Can’t find anywhere but Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Mary Douglas

customer_reviews.title: I wear these shoes everyday, and my feet don’t hurt.
customer_reviews.text: I work in a hospital, and I’m on my feet about 12 hrs a day. My feet are fine when I clock out and go home.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: It's shox. If you have ever worn shox before they are as expected. And i will never understand why they discontinued this style.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan petersen

customer_reviews.title: Great travel shoe! - Order a size larger
customer_reviews.text: Great travel shoe! - Order a size larger. Feels GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love my Nike shox it's been a long time since I bought a pair and I'm happy to report these ones fit well and look nice
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Tofanelli

customer_reviews.title: Old School perfection.
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite style of Nike shoes. Extremely Comfortable, stylish ( at least to this 41 yr old ) ALL LEATHER look brand new with a magic eraser and 2 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Sean kelly

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are clean and arrive in a good condition
customer_reviews.author: hugo a.

customer_reviews.title: satisfied in New York
customer_reviews.text: I am a nurse looking for comfortable shoes to wear at work. I notice that Nike tends to run on a narrow side so I ordered the shoe in mens seeing that they were wider and it worked just as expected. The shoes is an attention grabber and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: satisfied in New York

customer_reviews.title: Nike Shox review
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Shox. I was highly satisfied with the fit and support. I stand on my feet 10-12 hrs a day at work, so this shoe really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Linebarger

customer_reviews.title: the width at the front half of shoe should be ...
customer_reviews.text: the width at the front half of shoe should be a little wider to accommodate a wider foot. otherwise good
customer_reviews.author: happyw/g

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great fit and very comfy for long days at work
customer_reviews.author: jerri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Pretty comfortable and good looking. Love them
customer_reviews.author: ebr319

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My Brother was so happy that i gave it in his birthday my brother so happy with his gift thanks amazon again you’re my favorite

customer_reviews.title: Nike Shox
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! My husband lives this shox Nike's 2nd pair I've bought for him !,Highly recommend

customer_reviews.title: Clean white shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes and the delivery was right on the expected date of arrival
customer_reviews.author: Olaf garduno

customer_reviews.title: Extremely undersized
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run alot smaller than regular nikes. I have wore the same brand shoes for over 20 years and for some reason these are the only ones that run under size.
customer_reviews.author: BusterF.

customer_reviews.title: Nike shock
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe just to small in the width. But easy to return and get the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst pair of Nike I have ever purchased. Complete waste of.money
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product came quick but was kind of tight. But they will work.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Nike shoes feel different
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes just a little tight in the toe area. I used them for jogging but the tightness in the toe area wasn't too bad. Yet I hope when they get broken in they'll feel better. I always use Nike shoes for jogging but never felt this tightness before so I don't know why these shoes are.
customer_reviews.author: Dan O

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes unfortunately they don’t come in women’s so I had to get them in men. Still look just as I expected and love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shox are a nice model.
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of the shoe. And the shock absorbers.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. Ive been a Shox fan for quite ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Ive been a Shox fan for quite a while and where I live the all white color scheme is hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice pair of Nikes but they're too small 9/2 I should have got to 10
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Had to give one star and it don't need one ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to give one star and it don't need one... Got them oin the mail today and tops look new but the soles are worn so someone has wore them for a bit and then they were sold to me as new shoes paid 120 for used shoes..i thinks it bs
customer_reviews.author: Chris gamblin

customer_reviews.title: Nike Shox
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe glad I was able to find Shox’s at a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: But fit great.
customer_reviews.text: Something was on them when I received them . Had a very strong smell to them .
customer_reviews.author: D. goss

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shox for my boyfriend, I am so happy with my purchase, I love them
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Tinoco

customer_reviews.title: One bad ass pair of shox !
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect I didn't expect them to be delivered as fast as they were love love love them
customer_reviews.author: jeremy Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Order big.... runs small
customer_reviews.text: I've had several pairs of Shox... This shoe runs small. I have been stretching them for a week now. I use a rubber ball and sock to stretch them. They are beautiful, but you best order 1-1/2 size bigger. Super tight ... but stretchable. I love the look of the shoe. Total leather except the tongue. Very tight. Order big.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Carlin

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the shoes is not what I have come to expect from Nike!
customer_reviews.author: Brazilian in the US

customer_reviews.title: Magnet
customer_reviews.text: You left the store magnet on the product so I have to figure out how to cut it off.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect. can never go wrong with nike and the seller is awesome

customer_reviews.title: Great service with good turnaround time
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are everything I expected it to be. Great service from start to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Mostert

customer_reviews.title: They look great but the left shoe fits great
customer_reviews.text: They look great but the left shoe fits great, but the right shoe fits funny.. Its almost like the tongue is to small, Cuz I can see my sock on the sides of the tongue.. Not to happy about that..
customer_reviews.author: Jamaine Bell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and super comfortable. Plus the dark gray makes it easy to keep them clean.
customer_reviews.author: epwh

customer_reviews.title: Shox are the best for walking significant distance
customer_reviews.text: I walk 8.5 miles a day, 5 days of week. Shox provides the necessary support and comfort and is very durable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A Denzler

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't able to return
customer_reviews.text: I returned them but Amazon returned them back to me. They are too tight on the front but nothing I can do about apparently.

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look nice one shoe had crease in it like it had been worn

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: They fit terribly. I don’t even think these are real Nike’s. Very disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Bought for short rounds of golfing and work great. Very comfortable once broken in.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes that are a bit narrow for some, but fits my foot well.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I got a half size larger and it fit perfectly. Best shoes I've ever worn!

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 9 which fits...but a 9 1/2 would have fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Allred

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't feel like it's a size D
customer_reviews.text: I'm hoping it stretches a little in that it fits snug across my instep even though it's long enough. It doesn't feel like it's a size D. It feels like it is more like a C. Otherwise it's what I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good shoes and they fit just as well as my ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good shoes and they fit just as well as my last pair of older Shox I purchased years ago. I like the comfortable feel as they hug your foot. I just wish more colors were available but it seems this model may be going away too so they are selling what remaining stock they have left. I don't know why in the world shoe companies who have made some really nice shoes stop making them in a year and replace them with others that sometime don't look so good. These look really nice, I got the grey ones because you can wear them with anything and they go well.
customer_reviews.author: Maranatha

customer_reviews.title: The Nike shox are a great pair of shoes looks good
customer_reviews.text: The Nike shox are a great pair of shoes looks good. They are a little tight but I think when I wear them a few days they will loosing up

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are hands down the best shoes I have ever owned. A++++

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the sneakers best appreciate that all was as expected

customer_reviews.title: A bit snug, but a nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: I sent these back because they were not what I expected plus they were a little snug. They are really nice looking shoes and seemed pretty comfy. I have been wearing shox for the past several years and they are the only shoe I wear with the exception of hunting boots or dress shoes for work. I love Nike, just wasnt the right fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Phil L

customer_reviews.title: go a half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: a little too snug, I will try a half size bigger next time.

customer_reviews.title: but overall very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Snug fit,but overall very happy with my purchase,Received right on time

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. They are not made correctly.
customer_reviews.text: Not sewn right. Do not fit right. There is a lump in the top part of the left shoe. They cannot be worn without extreme pain. Worthless.

customer_reviews.title: As described but had to return them because they were ...
customer_reviews.text: As described but had to return them because they were too tight around my foot and rubbed. There was enough room for my toes however

customer_reviews.title: now this is what a good pair of shoes should feel like" So mission accomplished
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for his birthday and his exact words were "O my God, now this is what a good pair of shoes should feel like" So mission accomplished!

customer_reviews.title: Needs a little more cushion.
customer_reviews.text: You may need to put a insole in for more cushioning if you are going to be on your feet for several hours.

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Took me forever to find all white
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Took me forever to find all white, but these are my favorite sneakers. Fit perfectly. Very comfortable.
